## ResourceTypes.IResourceType interface

Interface for a resource type. Resource types are responsible for validating and converting JSON values into the appropriate strongly-typed resource value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IResourceType<T = unknown> extends ICollectible<ResourceTypeName, ResourceTypeIndex> 
```
**Extends:** ICollectible&lt;[ResourceTypeName](./ts-res.resourcetypename.md)<!-- -->, [ResourceTypeIndex](./ts-res.resourcetypeindex.md)<!-- -->&gt;
